Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the interior is ribbed and lightly covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of eleven lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Frankfort 1933 / The Cenotaph of Seti I at Abydos (no.4(p.95,pl.xciii))
Jasnow & Pouls Wegner 2006-2007 / Demotic Ostraca from North Abydos (p.50)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393836) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393836)
